properties.comment:
Entries must follow this Naming-Scheme (Keys) :
Questions : Question_NumberOfQuestion Answers : Answer_NumberOfCorrespondingQuestions.NumberOfAnswer TimeQuestion : TimeQuestion_NumberOfQuestion // ALL questions must have unique numbers Time : Time_NumberOfCorrespondingTimeQuestion Mediapath: Mediapath_NumberOfCorrespondingQuestion.NumberOfPath
## Please avoid Spaces at the Beginning of Keys AND Element-Content ##
